medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe abdominal pain post ERCP procedure.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had recurrent abdominal pain for several months during winter. After an elective ERCP for evaluation of sphincter of Oddi dysfunction, she developed severe abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Uterine fibroids s/p cholecystectomy, history of colonic polyps s/p LEEP.
